message.body: Do you know what the fine is if I get caught by l&i ? I think I am going to try and bust up my sidewalk and finish the plumbing on sat/Sunday .
Not sure of the fine. It's always easier to ask for forgiveness than permission.
Yeah I figure if I can get it done and get fined a few hundred dollars that is still a lot better than 7 thousand

As long as your neighbors are cool and you don't get a lot of traffic, you should be cool. Just make sure the hole is covered if you leave it open overnight. The parking authority looks out for that shit now.
Well i will cover it but there is still going to be a massive pile of dirt
I will tape it off with yellow tape too
The pile is ok...tell them you're just replacing your sidewalk. Cover with plywood & caution tape is great.
You're just compacting the sub grade, because your sidewalk sank and cracked.
